duties_responsibilities.duty: Sterilize and maintain medical instruments and equipment using appropriate techniques and equipment.
Handle the processing and distribution of medical equipment as per the established guidelines.
Manage inventory of medical supplies and ensure adequate stock levels at all times.
Conduct quality control checks to ensure compliance with safety and hygiene standards.
Utilize medical terminology to communicate effectively with healthcare professionals and support staff.
Collaborate with the healthcare team to ensure efficient and timely processing of medical equipment.

education_certification.credential: Certification in Central Processing Technology (CPT) or equivalent
